Dashboard.title: Welcome to the dashboard

Transactions.title: My Transactions
Transactions.confirmApplyToAllTitle: Apply category to all similar transactions?
Transactions.confirmApplyToAllMessage: {count} similar transactions were found. Do you want to apply the category to all of them?
Transactions.deleteMessage: Do you want to delete this transaction permanently or just from the current view?
Transactions.confirmRemoveAllMessage: {count} similar transactions also contain this category. Do you want to remove it everywhere?
Transactions.refreshConfirm: This action will resynchronize all saved data. Do you want to continue?
